name: Software AG
goal: Software AG helps companies with their digital transformation. With Software AG’s Digital Business Platform, companies can better interact with their customers and bring them on new ‘digital’ journeys, promote unique value propositions, and create new business opportunities. In the Internet of Things (IoT) market, Software AG enables enterprises to integrate, connect and manage IoT components as well as analyze data and predict future events based on Artificial Intelligence (AI). The Digital Business Platform is built on decades of uncompromising software development, IT experience and technological leadership. Software AG has more than 4,700 employees, is active in 70 countries and had revenues of €866 million in 2018.
interests: Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
• Artificial Intelligence
• Digital Single Market
• Digital Platforms
• Digital Economy
• Horizon2020/ Horizon Europe
• Industrie 4.0 / Internet of Things
• Big Data
• Data Protection

• Intellectual Property Rights
• Open Data
